name: Hello World AVS
description: A simple Hello World AVS demonstrating basic EigenLayer functionality with task creation and operator responses.

documentation.overview: This AVS demonstrates the basic functionality of EigenLayer's AVS framework through a simple Hello World implementation.
documentation.operator_guide: Operators can register and respond to tasks created by the service manager.
documentation.api_reference: Contract ABI and function documentation available in the repository.

requirements.operator_requirements: Any Ethereum address can register as an operator
